TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AppendRowsDataView extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.ISchematized
Public NotInheritable Class AppendRowsDataView Implements IDataView
type AppendRowsDataView = class interface IDataView interface ISchematized

Docs.summary:
This class provides the functionality to combine multiple IDataView objects which share the same schema All sources must contain the same number of columns and their column names, sizes, and item types must match. The row count of the resulting IDataView will be the sum over that of each individual.
An AppendRowsDataView instance is shuffleable iff all of its sources are shuffleable and their row counts are known.

Docs.param: The schema for the result. If this is null, the first source's schema will be used.
Docs.summary:
Create a dataview by appending the rows of the sources.
All sources must be consistent with the passed-in schema in the number of columns, column names, and column types. If schema is null, the first source's schema will be used.
